1.text: so you acctually punch in the correct digits ?

2.name: kiet the dev
2.text: that's wierd because this dialog is only meant for 1 person only

5.name: kiet the dev
5.text: this game is a one men effort to make a specifi person's special day even more special...

6.name: kiet the dev
6.text: you have been my biggest motivation to complete this project that i wanted to give up may times...

7.name: kiet the dev
7.text: thank you and once again happy birthday -from the dev-

8.text: why is that tourch up side down ?

9.name: kiet the dev
9.text: cuz i am the dev, i do what i want!
